body:
Well, the good news is that the build took 4 and a half hours and finished successfully.

The bad news is that it still failed trying to pull the artifact from the build task into the testing task:

```
Downloading build result

gzip: stdin: unexpected end of file
tar: Child returned status 1
tar: Error is not recoverable: exiting now
```

@mythmon said that he asked the TaskCluster folks about this when we first saw it a few days ago and they said it was due to a deploy that day and had been resolved. That doesn't appear to be the case here.
body_text:

The bad news is that it still failed trying to pull the artifact from the build task into the testing task:

@mythmon said that he asked the TaskCluster folks about this when we first saw it a few days ago and they said it was due to a deploy that day and had been resolved. That doesn't appear to be the case here.
body_html:
Well, the good news is that the build took 4 and a half hours and finished successfully.

The bad news is that it still failed trying to pull the artifact from the build task into the testing task:

Downloading build result

gzip: stdin: unexpected end of file
tar: Child returned status 1
tar: Error is not recoverable: exiting now

@mythmon said that he asked the TaskCluster folks about this when we first saw it a few days ago and they said it was due to a deploy that day and had been resolved. That doesn't appear to be the case here.
